merge_before_transcript:
chandler: That sounds like my first bike. (They all turn and look at him.) My dad gave me his old one.
monica: Did the girl ever let you ride it?
phoebe_transcript: No! But she gave me the box that it came in. It had a picture of the bike on the front. (Theyâ€™re all speechless) So I would sit on it and my step-dad would drag me around the backyard.
